roleset.name: samba
roleset.note: SAMBA-V NOTES: hand-checked by Kevin. Member of Vncls waltz-51.5. (from samba.01-v)

role.descr: person(s) doing the samba (intransitive subject, transitive object)

example.name: intransitive usage with location
example.text: They sambaed in a dark, smoky club, looking deeply into one another's eyes.
example.arg: looking deeply into one another's eyes
